Greetings,

My name is Amy, occasionally known as Saiaiko, and I've been lurking 
in the shadows for a bit.  Probably, I'll stay there until I feel I 
have something to contribute, but I wanted to introduce myself. 

I am very interested in the late Heian - early Kamakura periods, 
specifically the Gempei War.  I have recently acquired a fine yumi, 
optimistically named Benkei, and am currently learning technique.  I 
have enjoyed your discussions so far, especially the passionate 
ones, and I look forward to learning from them.  

Thank you.

~ Amy

PS:  Is it kosher to post a background I created in the Files area?
